Publication Built-in Topic
[Built-in Topics]

Builtin topic for accessing information about the Publications discovered by RTI Data Distribution Service. More...

 Entry created when a DDS_DataWriter is discovered in association with its Publisher. More...

Variables

const char * DDS_PUBLICATION_TOPIC_NAME
 Publication topic name.

Detailed Description

Builtin topic for accessing information about the Publications discovered by RTI Data Distribution Service.

Typedef Documentation

typedef struct DDS_PublicationBuiltinTopicDataDataReader DDS_PublicationBuiltinTopicDataDataReader
 

Declares IDL datareader < DDS_PublicationBuiltinTopicData > .

DDS_DataReader of topic DDS_PUBLICATION_TOPIC_NAME used for accessing DDS_PublicationBuiltinTopicData of the remote DDS_DataWriter and the associated DDS_Publisher.

Instantiates:
<<generic>> FooDataReader
See also:
DDS_PublicationBuiltinTopicData
